# UVVR maps for Partner meeting 7/1/2020

```{r}
library(raster)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(janitor)
library(maps)
library(mapdata)
library(tmap)
```

```{r}
uvvr <- stack("UVVR_Landsat_UVVR (2).tif")

nlayers(uvvr)
```

```{r}
uvvr_df <- as.data.frame(uvvr, xy = TRUE)
```

```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_raster(data = uvvr_df, 
              aes(x = x,
                  y = y,
                  fill = UVVR)) +
  coord_quickmap() +
  theme_light() 


```

```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_raster(data = uvvr_df, 
              aes(x = x,
                  y = y,
                  fill = UVVR_2009)) +
  coord_quickmap() +
  theme_light()
```


```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_raster(data = uvvr_df, 
              aes(x = x,
                  y = y,
                  fill = UVVR_diff)) +
  coord_quickmap() +
  theme_light()
```
